article_text: Federal regulators may ultimately approve the megamerger of Aetna and Humana, but the resulting insurance behemoth will not be welcome to do certain business in Missouri.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Nick Thornton
article_metadata.description: Prudential will assume the responsibility of managing the company’s retiree defined benefit pension assets and disbursing monthly payments.
